item.description:
Just a reminder that we will be having a holiday gift grab at this meetup ...nothing too expensive, maybe ten dollars or so. Also, I will get a card for the guys in the band and throw in a lottery ticket for each of them...any donations toward the gift would be graciously accepted that evening by yours truly! ;-)

You are invited to bring a wrapped, non gender specific and relatively inexpensive gift item. If you bring a gift you can then choose one from the exchange when the band takes a break around 11.... :-) Please plan to come, eat, drink, dance and be merry.

Reply yes or no for dinner at 7:30 and try to arrive by 7:15 to help gather tables (no reservations here)
The band plays from 9 PM - 1 AM.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Holidays Celebration with Four on the Floor
